attributes.action: Allow NHS workers and Care staff to take driving tests
attributes.additional_details: We are all tested three times a week and practice the strictest infection control, always sticking to the rules, so there would be minuscule chances of transmitting COVID-19.
attributes.background: Allow NHS and care workers to do their driving tests if booked throughout lockdown as public transport can be very dangerous for us if taxis/ buses etc don’t get cleaned properly whilst working with vulnerable people.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Allow driving tests and lessons for Keyworkers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566844
